Title: Let's Stay Together
Plot: Jack must appear before Congress to discuss NBC's merger with KableTown. He hopes that he will charm celebrity members, but one Congresswoman, Regina Bookman, demands more diversity in its programming lineup. Jack quickly enlists Tracy to come up with some new development ideas. Meanwhile, Liz is fed up with the flack her writing staff gives her, and Jenna helps Kenneth reapply to the extremely competitive Page Program.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: John Amos, Todd Buonopane, Reg E. Cathey, Queen Latifah, Rob Reiner
